MAP.COMMENT: Map PO Number from ZORDER_ACK to PONumber variable

INVOKE.COMMENT: invoke the service getPurchaseOrderFromTN - get PO from TN

INVOKE.COMMENT: cXML version of the adapter is obtained
payload ID obtained using inbuilt adapter service
datetime stamp obtained using inbuilt adapter service

record.value: The data/time stamp in ISO8601 format.
The data/time stamp in ISO8601 format.

INVOKE.COMMENT: Confirmation Request document is converted into xmldata
send Confirmation Email to end user

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: When PO NUmber does not match
